sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './private.css'; const PrivacyPolicy = () => { return (

Privacy Policy

1. Introduction

Welcome to Faith's Confectionery's Privacy Policy!

2. Information We Collect

We collect personal information you provide to us, such as name, email address, phone number, etc., when you interact with our website or services.

3. Use of Information

We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, process orders, and personalize your experience.

4. Sharing of Information

We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you.

5. Security of Information

We implement security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

6. Your Choices

You can choose not to provide certain information, but it may limit your ability to use certain features of our website.

7. Changes to Privacy Policy

We reserve the right to update or change our Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting the updated Privacy Policy on the website.

8. Contact Us

If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us:

  • Email: faithconfidentionalbakery@gmail.com
  • Phone: +265888769228
  • Address:81-79 Kyanja Ring Rd, Kampala
); } export default PrivacyPolicy;
